actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: As you might have realized now, yes indeed! Some of the darkness has eventually reached over to Perkins.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: The darkness isn’t as strong as it could be here, but it has corrupted some everyday items into beings of somewhat destruction.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: Our heroes realize that they should probably do something about this, so they postpone their trip to Keeney and fight back for the sake of Perkins.

actions.name: Narrator
actions.message: They set off to the Ground Floor.
